```{r load corpus,  message=FALSE, warning=TRUE, include=FALSE}
# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  select(speaker,
         mode,
         utt_slope,
         phr_phon,
         acc_phon,
         fin_phon,
         prompt) %>%
  mutate(h_start =
           if_else(
             !is.na((str_extract(phr_phon, "%H|\\^\\[%H|% H\\*"))),
             "H start",
             "no H start"),
         h_start = factor(h_start, levels = c("H start","no H start")),
         fin_phon = factor(str_replace_all(fin_phon, "\\^|\\[|\\]", ""),
                           levels=c("%", "L%")
           
         ))


```

- Include initial %H or % H* in model to mitigate against skewing effect of initial phonologically high f0
- Initial model has singularity issues
- Model word, but needs trimmed ()

```{r}
# set current equation
cur_equation  <- formula(
  utt_slope ~ mode
  + (1 + mode | speaker)
  + (1 | prompt)
  + (1 | h_start)
  + (1 | acc_phon)
  + (1 | fin_phon)
  )

```

```{r fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}
# set recommended equation
utt_slope_mdl  <-  lmer(cur_equation,
  data = m_corpus,
  control = lmerControl(
    optimizer = "optimx",
    calc.derivs = FALSE,
    optCtrl = list(
      method = "nlminb",
      starttests = FALSE,
      kkt = FALSE
    )
  )
)

# model needs trimming
m_corpus.trimmed <- m_corpus %>% filter(abs(scale(resid(utt_slope_mdl))) <= 3)


utt_slope_mdl.trimmed  <-  lmer(cur_equation,
  data = m_corpus.trimmed,
  control = lmerControl(
    optimizer = "optimx",
    calc.derivs = FALSE,
    optCtrl = list(
      method = "nlminb",
      starttests = FALSE,
      kkt = FALSE
    )
  )
)

summariseLME(utt_slope_mdl.trimmed, run_step = T,
              write="../output_model_anovas/utt_slope_full_phon_anova.csv")
```

```{r analyse model, fig.height=2.5, fig.width=5, results="asis"}
utt_slope_mdl.tidy <- analyseModel(
  utt_slope_mdl.trimmed,
  write="../output/utt_slope_full_phon"
)
utt_slope_mdl.tidy$table
```
